item.title: Kris Murphy Photography
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
From the beginning we were very excited about designing Kris' website because she started off by telling us how awesome our work is and how she wanted us to come up with original animated art to be the theme for her site.

The post Kris Murphy Photography appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
From the beginning we were very excited about designing Kris’ website because she started off by telling us how awesome she thought our work was and how she wanted us to come up with original animated art to be the theme for her site!

As inspiration Kris showed us a book by Eric Carle. We made a bunch of paintings and cut out pieces to bring into flash, where animation superhero, Kim Hui, brought them to life.

Original Paintings

Add Magic

The post Kris Murphy Photography appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: Launch: The Way
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
We're just getting back from our annual trip to Spain, coincidentally while there we launched a site for a film set on the Camino de Santiago a Compostela - 'The Way' directed by Emelio Estevez.

The post Launch: The Way appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
We’re just getting back from our annual trip to Spain, while we were there we coincidentally launched a site for a film set on the Camino de Santiago a Compostela – ‘The Way’ directed by Emelio Estevez.

‘The Way’ was directed by Emelio Estevez, and stars his father, Martin Sheen. In the movie Emelio’s character is somehow killed on the Camino de Santiago a Compostela, a religious pilgrimage through Spain. We haven’t seen the film yet, so we’re not sure how he dies, no spoilers here… but from the trailer we’ve gathered that his father takes his son’s ashes and goes on the camino himself.

Thanks to Ben at Mixed Media Workshop for getting this great job for us and collaborating on the work. Together we achieved some cool results with this site, and we’re very proud of the way it came out, also can’t wait to see the film, we’re big fans of Emelio!!

The post Launch: The Way appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: Flash Links
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
Flash can be used to add all kinds of interactivity and animation to your web pages, you can add flash movies to HTML pages to enhance them or even make an entire site in Flash (don't forget your HTML alternate content of course)

The post Flash Links appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
Flash can be used to add all kinds of interactivity and animation to your web pages, you can add flash movies to HTML pages to enhance them or even make an entire site in Flash (don’t forget your HTML alternate content of course)

Learning ActionScript 3.0
If you are trying to make the transition from AS2 to AS3 or if you want to learn AS3 but you’re not a mad programming genius, then this is the book for you (if you are a mad programming genius, get the Colin Moock book instead).
Kirupa
Great Tutorial, also has a forum for asking questions you might have.
Actionscript.org
Another forum for asking your ActionScript questions
FlashCreations
This site has some great tutorials.
CSS & Flash
Getting CSS to style your Flash content is a hard thing to figure out, this page helped us out a lot.
Track Flash Events with Google Analytics
You can now track events in flash movies with your Google Analytics Account. Also this page is helpful when you’re ready to try some more advanced tracking of flash events with google analytics using variables.

The post Flash Links appeared first on mimoYmima.

Semantic Management helps small businesses get serious about their financials by getting their bookkeeping automated and organized. How do i get a loan? item.content:encoded:
Semantic Management helps small businesses get serious about their financials by getting their bookkeeping automated and organized. How do i get a loan? We created an identity that plays up their mission: ‘sustainable bookkeeping’.

Logo & Business Card Design

NOTE: Probably our favorite part of this project was the afterparty. The business owner, James Schaeffer really knows how to launch a website!

semanticmanagement.com
